* 功能: 修改用户头像

* URL: /api/user/profile/modifyPhoto

* request
```
{
    "token":"y5atdEZ3",
    "sitecode": "cine.ios.iphone",
    "channel": "i5", 
    "locale": "zh_CN",
    "appver": "1.1.6",
    "data":{  //heead_image 为base64位的字符串
        "head_image":""
    }
}
```

* response
```
{
    "code": "1",
    "code_desc": "success",
    "except_case": "",
    "except_case_desc": "",
    "result": {
        "img": "2017/11/02/d011509608944615UtjFbaP3Eh.jpg"
    }
}
```
  - token错误时 response
  ```
  {
    "code": "1",
    "code_desc": "success",
    "except_case": "",
    "except_case_desc": "no_login"
  }
  ```
          
  - 参数异常时 response
  
 except_case_desc|错误描述
 -|-
 token_is_null|token为空
 img_is_null|图片为空
